```{r}
read_csv('data/Cleaned Data.csv', show_col_types = FALSE) |>
  select(rank, year, founder_is_ceo, foreign_born_ceo, female_ceo, employees)
```


```{r}
read_csv('data/Cleaned Data.csv', show_col_types = FALSE) |>
  filter(rank <= 500) |>
  select(year,employees) |>
  summarize(mean(employees, na.rm = TRUE), .by=year)
```
